sources.title: Ride (ACTION whole film German, watch new action films in full length)

metadata.Plot: Kyle and Max are two extreme sports athletes, two riders in continuous challenge and search for money. When they find out of the enigmatic proposal for a mysterious contest by an unknown organization, Black Babylon, they can't turn down the $ 150,000 prize. But the "contest" will turn out to be much darker and deadlier than expected.
metadata.Writer: Fabio Guaglione, Fabio Resinaro, Marco Sani
metadata.Actors: Lorenzo Richelmy, Ludovic Hughes, Simone Labarga
